Name: Average time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and the first occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection until the next distinct activity in each variant
Metric: The average of the duration between activity SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to be followed by any reviewer-related outcome (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer Unavailable, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total elapsed time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW-Reviewer Selection is now due across all process variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to the first Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Average cycle time of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection when followed by at least one SW-Reviewer Declined versus when directly followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Total time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in cases where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs within three subsequent activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average time from Manuscript Export Succeeded to SW-Initial Reviewer Selection compared to the average time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Checklist Completed and SW-Initial Reviewer Selection versus elapsed time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-EIC Major Revision in variants that pass through SW-Reviewer Agreed without intermediate declines
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to lead to a final decision (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision) when SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs within the first five activities after selection
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in variants with more than two reviewer assignment attempts versus variants with direct agreement
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and the last occurrence of any reviewer status activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined) before proceeding to editorial decision
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision specifically in the longest-performing variant (performance = 47316796.000)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to the appearance of any “due” notification (e.g., SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days) across all cases
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days'

Name: Cycle time of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection measured from its timestamp to the timestamp of the next non-system administrative activity in the ACM journal review workflow
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and the end of the case
